name: 張俊明
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
Week1: Introduction to Microelectronic Circuits 
Week2: Characteristics of Operational Amplifiers
Week3: Nodal Analysis and Loop Analysis of Op-Amp-Based Circuits
Week4: Non-linear Op-Amp-Based Circuits 
Week5: Physics of Semiconductors
Week6: Physics of Bipolar Transistors
Week7: DC Analysis of Bipolar Transistor Circuits
Week8: Small-Signal Analysis of Bipolar Transistor Circuits 
Week9: Midterm
Week10: Cascode Stages and Current Mirrors
Week11:  Differential Amplifiers
Week12:  Differential Amplifiers
Week13:  Frequency Responses
Week14:  Frequency Responses
Week15: DC Analysis of Integrated Circuits
Week16: Small-Signal Analysis of Integrated Circuits 
Week17: Small-Signal Analysis of Integrated Circuits
Week18: Final
materials:
1. Microelectronic Circuits by Sedra and Smith
2. Fundamentals of Microelectronics by Behzad Razavi
